name: SlenderJob
description:
You're sick of looking for and not finding a job in the video game industry. One day, a person named Irene convinces you to collaborate in one of her projects, but what you didn't imagine is that you would end up living one of the worst teamwork experiences.

Look for the eight notes to find out what happened and walk out the door that will lead you to better job opportunities.

Special Thanks

JaviCKP for the music & sound effects.

https://soundcloud.com/javickp

Saúl Cruzado Prieto for the dubbing.

https://twitter.com/Ulrisdev

Google Images for the game art
